entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 1.

entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
